Hey im a nice guy so ill tell any new person how to actually get this working, this was new to me as well the FLT files but heres what you do
1.open the folder you saved your Command and conquer files
2.rename ALL the FLT-RA21.001 to FLT-RA21.r01 replace all the first 0's with the lowercase r.
2.1/2 DO NOT RENAME FLT-RA21.RAR that will make you a dumbass and not let the file be reconized
3. click the first file theFLT-RA21.r01 one then use winraw to extract it. you get a CUE. flie and a BIN.
